name: Escape The Island - Hidden Object Game
name_original: Escape The Island - Hidden Object Game
description:
You are stranded - try to escape the island!

Objects you need to use to escape are hidden around the island - your tasking is simple, explore the island and find them all!

Explore lush tropical vegetation with the sights and sounds of a far away paradise. Use your ingenuity to find hidden paths and climb rocks to explore the island fully.

Search the island at your own pace. No time limits!
